Class HubAddRemoveDelegate

extends java.lang.Object

canAdd

public static boolean canAdd(Hub thisHub,
                             java.lang.Object obj)
Used to find out if an object can be added/inserted to this Hub. Makes sure that object that being added is for the correct class. Calls all HubListeners.hubBeforeAdd() where HubEvent.object and pos are both set. If objects are OAObjets, then canAdd is called for each object. If it is a recursive Hub, then it will verify that it can have the parent set.

See Also:
OAObject#canAdd, #setObjectClass

move

protected static void move(Hub thisHub,
                           int posFrom,
                           int posTo)
Swap the position of two different objects within the hub. This will call the move method. Sends a hubMove event to all HubListeners.

Parameters:
posFrom - position of object to move
posTo - position where object should be after the move

insert

public static boolean insert(Hub thisHub,
                             java.lang.Object obj,
                             int pos)
Insert an Object at a position. Hub Listeners will be notified with an insert event.

If Hub is sorted, then object will be inserted at correct/sorted position.

Parameters:
obj - Object to insert, must be from the same class that was used when creating the Hub
pos - position to insert the object into the Hub. If greater then size of Hub, then it will be added to the end.
Returns:
true if object was added else false (event hubBeforeAdd() threw an exception)
See Also:
#getObjectClass, add(com.viaoa.hub.Hub, java.lang.Object), #sort

swap

public static void swap(Hub thisHub,
                        int pos1,
                        int pos2)
Swap the positon of two different objects within the hub. This will call the move method.

Parameters:
pos1 - position of object to move from, if there is not an object at this position, then no move is performed.
pos2 - position of object to move to, if there is not an object at this position, then no move is performed.
See Also:
move(com.viaoa.hub.Hub, int, int)
